about_the_game:
Welcome to Knightfall Showdown, where strategy meets chaos on the ultimate chess battlefield!

In this thrilling battle royale experience, 100 players are dropped onto a vast chessboard, each starting as a Knight with one goal: to outwit, outmaneuver, and outlast your opponents. As the clock ticks down, you'll have 30 seconds to collect as many pawns as possible, positioning yourself for supremacy when the action begins.

Gameplay Features:

  • Dynamic Pawn Collection: Use the initial 30 seconds wisely to gather pawns scattered across the board. Every pawn counts, giving you the edge in combat and upgrades.

  • Tactical Movement: Every 3 seconds, players can choose their next move strategically. Navigate the board, avoid conflicts, or set up ambushes while the storm gradually shrinks the battlefield, forcing players closer together.

  • Combat Mechanics: Engage in thrilling battles when your piece collides with another. If two pieces of the same rank meet, the player with more collected pawns upgrades to a higher hierarchy. But beware—higher-ranking pieces like Bishops, Rooks, and Queens can eliminate lower ranks with ease, stealing their pawns in the process.

  • ELO Ranking System: Show off your skills as you earn or lose ELO points based on your performance. Rise through the ranks, earn prestigious titles like CM, FM, IM, and GM, and compete against the best in the live leaderboard.

  • Endless Strategies: Whether you prefer stealth, aggression, or calculated moves, each match presents a unique opportunity to refine your strategy. Form alliances, betray friends, and adapt to an ever-changing battlefield.

Are you ready to step into the arena of Knightfall Showdown? Gather your wits, collect your pawns, and prepare for the most exhilarating chess experience of your life. Can you rise to the top and become the last piece standing? The chessboard awaits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz 32-bit or 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: Step into the ultimate chess rumble! In Knightfall Showdown, 100 players face off on a massive board, upgrading pieces and outsmarting opponents in intense elimination rounds. Strategize, rise through the ranks, and become the last piece standing!
